title: GSTN Enables Flexible CGST and SGST ITC Utilisation from February 2026 Tax Period!
content:
# GSTN Enables Flexible CGST and SGST ITC Utilisation from February 2026 Tax Period!

Ek important update hai! The Goods and Services Tax Network (GSTN) ne taxpayers ke liye Input Tax Credit (ITC) utilisation mein ek significant flexibility announce ki hai. Ab aap February 2026 tax period se CGST aur SGST ITC ko IGST liability adjust karne ke liye kisi bhi order mein use kar payenge.

Pehle, IGST liability ko set-off karne ke liye ek fixed order follow karna padta tha â€“ pehle IGST ITC, phir CGST ITC, aur uske baad SGST ITC. Is rigid sequence ke karan kabhi-kabhi taxpayers ko cash mein payment karni padti thi, even if unke paas SGST ITC available hota tha.

Ab, is naye system enhancement se, after fully utilising your IGST ITC, aap CGST aur SGST ITC ko apni suvidha ke according, kisi bhi proportion aur sequence mein use kar sakte hain to clear remaining IGST liability.

Ye change compliance ko simplify karega, ease of doing business badhayega, aur cash flow management mein bhi help karega.
